Text: Fuck the death worshipping madness called Islam. When will the world grow a pair and call Islam on its  institutionalized racism and barbaric fascism? I spit on the Koran!

There is no discussion about Islam in the movie, so I assume this Sargent_D. is just one more ranting idiot who comments on everything everywhere and all the time... without having a slightest clue about the subject commented upon. Watch the film first, or shut up, please. Thank you.
